 2024-09182024-07-24PMO
ActNational Security and Intelligence Review Agency Act
PrecisReappointment of CRAIG STEPHEN FORCESE of Ottawa, Ontario, as a member of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency; and his designation as Vice-Chair of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of CRAIG STEPHEN FORCESE of Ottawa, Ontario, as a member of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency; and his designation as Vice-Chair of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years.
